data.title: Anjou
data.text:
(see also England-Plantagenet)

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox)

HENRY II, Curt Mantel, King of England 1154-89, was born on 5 March 1132/33 and died on 6 July 1189. He married, on 18 May 1153, Eleanor of Aquitaine who was born in 1123 and died on 26 March 1202 or on 3 March 1204.

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox, Hugh Bigod, Roger Bigod)

HAMELINE PLANTAGENET (see Warren) died on 7 May 1202. He married in 1163, as her sec- ond husband, Isabel de Warren.

HENRY II and HAMELINE were the children of

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox, Hugh Bigod, Roger Bigod)

GEOFFREY V "Plantagenet," Count of Anjou, Duke of Normandy, was born on 24 August ll13 and died on 7 September 1151. He married, on 3 April 1127, Matilda of England (see England- Norman), daughter of King Henry I. Matilda was born in 1104 and died on 10 September 1167. (T, K)

SIBYL of Anjou married in 1131 and was the second wife of Thierry of Lorraine, Count of Flanders, who died in 1166.

GEOFFREY V and SIBYL were the children of

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox, Hugh Bigod, Roger Bigod)

FULK V "The Young," Count of Anjou, King of Jerusalem, was the son of Fulk IV and his fifth wife, Bertrade. He was born in 1092 and died on 10 November 1143. His first wife, whom he married in 1110, was Erembourg of Maine who died in 1126.

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury)

ERMENGARDE d' ANJOU was the daughter of Fulk IV and his first wife Hildegarde. She died on 1 June 1147. She married, second, Alan IV Fergant, Duke of Brittany, who died in 1119. She was the daughter of FuIk and Hildegarde.

FULK V and ERMENGARDE were the children of

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox, Hugh Bigod, Roger Bigod)

FULK IV, Count of Anjou, was born in 1043 and died on 14 April 1109. He married, first, Hildegarde de Baugency. He married, fifth, in 1090/91, Bertrade de Montfort. FuIk IV was the son of

ERMENGARDE of Anjou died on 21 March 1076. She married, second, about 1035, Aubri-Geoffrey, Count of the Gatinais, who died on 1 April 1046. Ermengarde was the daughter of

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox, Hugh Bigod, Roger Bigod)

FULK III "The Black," Count of Anjou, was born in 970 and died on 21 June 1040. He married, second, after 1000, Hildegarde, who died on 1 April 1040 in Jerusalem.

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox, William de Mowbray)

GERGERGE d'ANJOU married Guillaume Taillefer II, 5th Count of Angouleme, who died on 6 April 1028.

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox, Hugh Bigod, Roger Bigod, Henry de Bohun, Gilbert de Clare, Richard de Clare, John de Lacie, William de Lanvallei)

ERMENGARDE d'ANJOU married, in 980, Conan I, Count de Bretagne (see Brittany), who died in 992.

FULK III, GERGERGE and ERMENGARDE were the children of

(Ancestral line of John Talbot, 10th Earl of Shrewsbury, Ancestral line of descendants of Rev. John Knox, Hugh Bigod, Roger Bigod, Henry de Bohun, Gilbert de Clare, Richard de Clare, John de Lacie, William de Lanvallei, William de Mowbray)

GEOFFREY I "Grisgonelle," Count of Anjou, died on 21 July 987. He married Adelaide de Ver. mandois, who is also known as Adelaide de Chalons and who was born in 950 and died in 975/78. Geoffrey I was the son of

FULK II "The Good," Count of Anjou, died in 958. He married Gerberga of the Gatinais. Fulk II was the son of

FULK "The Red," was born in 888 and died in 938. He married Roscilla of Blois. Fulk was the son of

INGELERUS I, Count of Anjou, married Adelina of Challon. Ingelerus I was the son of

THERTULLUS, Count of Anjou. He married Petronella, daughter of Conrad, Count of Paris.
